description.value: You touch a creature with the minion trait and share the heightened sense of autonomy you've discovered. The minion is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] for 1 round and is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. It can use this extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
